title: Huawei Watch_How long does it take to charge the Huawei Watch?
answer:
A full charging cycle takes 75 minutes.

The battery icon ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/7345a_b8omb.png "click to enlarge") on the watch's screen indicates the current charging status. Once charged, the battery icon will indicate a full battery.
![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/7345b_hj4vh.gif) NOTE: 

The watch will enter power saving mode (screen off) if the battery level is lower than 5%.
